law.catch_line: Registration fee -- Trust and agency account.

text.section: Each employer of one (1) or more legislative agents shall pay a registration fee of two hundred fifty dollars ($250) to the commission.

All fees collected by the commission under the provisions of this section shall be deposited in the State Treasury in a trust and agency fund account to the credit of the commission. These agency funds shall be used to supplement general fund appropriations to the commission.

law.history: Created 1993 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 28, effective September 16, 1993.
